amendment.description: Making emergency supplemental appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2016, and for other purposes.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 3899 withdrawn in Senate.
Cloture on amendment SA 3899 not invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 45. Record Vote Number: 74.
Cloture motion on amendment SA 3899 presented in Senate.

Amendment SA 3899 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Cornyn to Amendment SA 3896. (consideration: CR S2733) Making emergency supplemental appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2016, and for other purposes.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Cloture on amendment SA 3899 not invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 45. Record Vote Number: 74.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3899 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Cornyn to Amendment SA 3896.
